update company_registration_info set unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_phone = #{unitPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_county_code = #{unitCountyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_town_code = #{unitTownCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_type_id = #{unitTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_address = #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_num = #{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_social = #{unitSocial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry_category_id = #{industryCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person_name = #{legalPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, worker_num = #{workerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_checked = #{isChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER} where unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.*,d.dictionary_name FROM company_registration_info c, dictionary d WHERE c.is_checked = d.dictionary_id
AND c.unit_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{unitName},"%")
AND c.unit_phone like CONCAT(#{unitPhone},"%")
